content.text: Michael Scotch is the name Dwight Schrute uses when he calls David Wallace's office and tells them that he has his son in the trunk of his car befire he is promptly cut off by Michael Scott who attempts to fix the situation. When Michael finally gets put through to Charles he goes silent and says "I was never given a name" when he was asked who was calling.
